remarks: Define a closure system of _Noetherian type_ (not standard terminology) as an algebraic system where all closed sets are finitely generated. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
statement:
df-nacs $p |- NoeACS = ( x e. _V |-> { c e. ( ACS ` x ) | A. s e. c E. g e. ( ~P x i^i Fin ) s = ( ( mrCls ` c ) ` g ) } ) $.
$d c g s x $.
